q: Windows Phone 7, said while sales were certainly a measure of the platform's success, customer satisfaction and developer investment were more important leading indicators. And to that end, the company has been pleased. 93 per cent of Windows Phone customers are satisfied or very satisfied with Windows Phone 7, and 90 per cent would recommend the phone to others, Greg Sullivan said. Those numbers were based on a recent survey of Windows Phone 7 customers numbering in the hundreds. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
